definition.p: User content is the collection of modules that testers use to understand how to use tests, write tests, create reports and build this manual. It exists primarily as a user guide for the test scripts. Each user module is found in a subdirectory of the User directory.

ul.name: Each subdirectory contains modules conforming to the modularbook DTD
ul.li: *.htm - javascript in HTML used for validation
*.jpg - another image format used by HTML browsers

definition.p: A file named overview.xml or maintask.xml contains a summary of the modules in the subdirectory and links to them. When a subdirectory has a maintask file, all the modules describe tasks to be performed. When a subdirectory has an overview file, all the modules describe facts about the topic.
